body:
@adg That explains part of the confusion: The front page makes it look as if the sub repos had detailed information being built both against tip and 1.4. But when clicking on the sub repo link (from the front page), the sup repo details page is always against tip. Suggestion: That sub-repo page should say "against tip".

Now looking at the sub-repo page against tip, the first line for x/tools is actually not fully populated (look at freebsg-amd64-gce101 column), but the front page shows an ok for that column. Shouldn't they correspond?
